## Remarks

Increasing in width from 0 to 100% of the track, in sync with the processâ€™s progress, with a simplified buffering effect. Refer to [Guideline](https://material.io/design/components/progress-indicators.html#linear-progress-indicators) or [MDL implementation](http://www.getmdl.io/components/index.html#loading-section/progress)
